classes.description: A device containing explosive or combustible chemicals that produce light, sound, and smoke.

properties.name: fireworkName
properties.description: The name or type of the firework.

properties.name: effects
properties.description: Description of visual and auditory effects produced by the firework.

properties.name: duration
properties.description: Duration in seconds for which the firework displays its effects.

properties.name: safetyGuidelines
properties.description: Safety precautions and guidelines for use.

properties.name: manufacturer
properties.description: The company or individual who manufactured the firework.

classes.description: A company or individual producing fireworks.

properties.name: location
properties.description: Location or headquarters of the manufacturer.

properties.name: contact
properties.description: Contact details for inquiries or support.
